metadata.description: Optional custom resource group name (defaults to appName-environment-rg)
Tags to apply to all resources
Azure OpenAI endpoint (optional - configure manually after deployment)
App Service Plan SKU for Web App (e.g., F1, B1, S1, P0v3, P1v3)
Function App URL for API backend
Optional: App Service Plan ID to share with existing plan. If empty, creates a new plan.
Enable VNet integration (only when subnet ID is provided)
Optional: Subnet ID for VNet integration
App Service Plan SKU name (e.g., F1, B1, S1, P0v3, P1v3)
